name: Omniverse Vision
tag_list: cinema, movie-theatre, events, concerts, sports, content, worldwide, entertainment, film, movie
overview:
Omniverse Vision is a producer, aggregator and distributor of unique, entertainment and special interest content for all media platforms with a particular focus on alternative cinema.

Formed in March 2010, the company now has a global distribution network of more than 2,000 digital cinema locations and has released 14 films to date, achieving box office of more than Â£5m.

milestones.description: Phantom of the Opera 25th Concert in >700 US cinemas live
JLS - Eyes Wide Open 3D hits Box Office Top 5
milestones.source_description: Promo News - JLS movie Eyes Wide Open 3D crashes into UK box office Top 10 at #5
